array.name: DATABASE_INFO
array.item: test.db

array.name: CREATE_TABLE_SQL
array.item: create table if not exists AnnounceCommands( Id INTEGER, CommandNo text, CommandInterval text, Direction text, SpeedLimitLocation text, StartEndTime text, LoseEffectTime text, LimitedSpeed integer, AddTime text, IsActive text, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists Announcement( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, Title text, Content text, SystemUserId integer, AnnounceType integer, BusinessType integer, DepartmentId integer, DepartmentName text, FileName text, FilePath text, PubTime text, IsLoaded integer not null DEFAULT false, LocaPath text, IsRead integer not null DEFAULT 0, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists AppOperateLog ( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, LogType integer, LogContent text, OperatorId integer, DeviceId integer, AddTime text, IsUploaded text not null DEFAULT 0)

create table if not exists AppUpdate ( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, Version text, UpdateLog text, Url text, HashCode text, Token text, AddTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists BaseLine( Id INTEGER, LineName text, FirstStationId integer, FirstStation text, LastStationId integer, LastStation text, LineLength text, Spell text, UpdateTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false, TableNamessss text)
create table if not exists BaseStation( Id INTEGER, StationName text, SN integer, Spell text, UpdateTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false, TableNamessss text)
create table if not exists DbUpdateLog ( Id INTEGER, TableName text, UpdateType integer, TargetId integer, UpdateTime text, IsUploaded integer, TableNamessss text)
create table if not exists DepartInfo( Id INTEGER, DepartmentName text, ParentId integer, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT 0, AddTime text, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists DrivePlan( Id INTEGER, LineName text, TrainCode text, LocoType text, DriverNo text, DriverName text, ViceDriverNo text, ViceDriverName text, StudentNo text, StudentName text, OtherNo1 text, OtherName1 text, OtherNo2 text, OtherName2 text, AttendTime text, StartTime text, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists DriveRecords( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, DriverId1 integer, DriverId2 integer, ViceDriverId integer, StudentDriverId integer, OtherDriverId integer, LocomotiveType text, AttendTime text, GetTrainTime text, LeaveDepotTime1 text, LeaveDepotTime2 text, AttendForecast text, ArriveDepotTime1 text, ArriveDepotTime2 text, GiveTrainTime text, RecordEndTime text, OperateConsume text, StopConsume text, RecieveEnergy text, LeftEnergy text, EngineOil text, AirCompressorOil text, TurbineOil text, GearOil text, GovernorOil text, OtherOil text, Staple text, MultiLocoDepot text, MultiLocoType text, MultiLocoSection text, EndSummary text, AddTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT 0, CarriageCount text, CarryingCapacity text, Length text, TrainCode text, LineName text, IsUploaded integer, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists DriveSignPoint( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, DriveRecordId integer, StationId integer, ArriveTime text, LeaveTime text, EarlyMinutes integer, LateMinutes integer, EarlyOrLateReason text, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists DriveTrainNoAndLine( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, DriveRecordId integer, TrainNoId integer, LineId integer, AddTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT 0, TableNamessss text)
create table if not exists ExamAnswers( Id INTEGER, QuestionId integer, Answer text, IsRight text, TableNamessss text)
create table if not exists ExamErrorQuestions( Id INTEGER, PersionId integer, QuestionId integer, ErrorCount integer, HasRemembered text, IsUploaded integer, TableNamessss text)
create table if not exists ExamFiles( Id INTEGER, ExamTypeId integer, FileName text, FileDesc text, FilePath text, AddTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT 0, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists ExamNotify( Id INTEGER, ExamName text, PostId integer, ExamFilesId integer, QuestionCount integer, PassScore integer, ResitCount integer, EndTime text, TimeLimit text, AddTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT 0, ExamTypeId integer, TableNamessss text)
create table if not exists ExamQuestion( Id INTEGER, ExamFileId integer, Question text, AnswerType integer, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists ExamRecords( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, ExamNotifyId integer, PersionId integer, RightCount integer, WrongCount integer, Score integer, ExamTime text, TimeSpends integer, UploadTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT 0, IsUploaded integer, TableNamessss text)
create table if not exists ExamType( Id INTEGER, TypeName text, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists ExceptionLog( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, Message text, Source text, FileName text, Classname text, MethodName text, Instance text, Stacktrace text, HappenTime text, IsDelete text not null default false, IsUploaded integer not null default 0)
create table if not exists Feedback( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, Content text, PersonId integer, AddTime text, IsUploaded integer, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists InstructorAccept( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, InstructorId integer, AcceptDate text, DriverId integer, ViceDriverId integer, DriverScore text, ViceDriverScore text, Problems text, Suggests text, UploadTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false, IsUploaded integer)

create table if not exists InstructorAnalysis( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, InstructorId integer, TrainCode text, LocomotiveType text, RunDate text, RunSection text, DriverId integer, ViceDriverId integer, AnalysisStart text, AnalysisEnd text, Problems text, Suggests text, UploadTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false, IsUploaded integer, RecirdTime integer, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists InstructorCheck( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, InstructorId integer, StartTime text, EndTime text, Location text, CheckType text, ProblemCount integer, CheckContent text, Problems text, Suggests text, UploadTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false, IsUploaded integer, RecirdTime ingeter, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists InstructorGoodJob( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, InstructorId integer, WriteDate text, DriverId integer, GoodJobType text, GeneralSituation text, Suggests text, UploadTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false, IsUploaded integer, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists InstructorKeyPerson( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, InstructorId integer, ConfirmDate text, KeyPersonId integer, ExpectRemoveTime text, ActualRemoveTime text, KeyLocation text, PersonConfirmReason text, HelpMethod text, Changes text, PersonRemoveSuggests text, LocationConfirmReason text, ControlMethod text, ActualControl text, LocationRemoveSuggests text, UploadTime text, IsRemoved text not null DEFAULT false, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false, IsUploaded integer, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists InstructorLocoQuality( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, InstructorId integer, RegistDate text, TrainCode text, LocomotiveType text, DriverId integer, RepairClass text, MaintenanceStatus text, Score text, FaultLocation text, GeneralSituation text, UploadTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false, IsUploaded integer, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists InstructorPeccancy( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, InstructorId integer, WriteDate text, DriverId integer, PeccancyType text, GeneralSituation text, Analysis text, Suggests text, UploadTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false, IsUploaded integer, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists InstructorPlan( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, InstructorId integer, WriteDate text, WorkSummary text, Problems text, WorkPlans text, UploadTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false, IsUploaded integer, TableNamessss text)
create table if not exists InstructorQuota( Id INTEGER, QuotaName text, QuataAmmount text, AddTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists InstructorQuotaRecord( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, InstructorId integer, QuotaId integer, FinishedAmmount text, Year integer, Month integer, UpdateTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false, QuotaName text, IsUploaded integer not null default 0, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists InstructorRepair( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, InstructorId integer, HappenTime text, Location text, TrainCode text, LocomotiveType text, DriverId integer, ViceDriverId integer, StudentId integer, FaultLocation text, FaultReason text, Responsibility text, UploadTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false, IsUploaded integer, TableNamessss text)
create table if not exists InstructorRouterPosition( Id INTEGER, BssId text, Location text, AddTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false, Ip text)

create table if not exists InstructorTeach( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, InstructorId integer, TeachPlace text, JoinCount integer, TeachStart text, TeachEnd text, TeachContent text, UploadTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false, IsUploaded integer, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists InstructorTempTake( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, InstructorId integer, TakeDate text, TrainCode text, LocomotiveType text, DriverId integer, ViceDriverId integer, StudentId integer, CarCount integer, WholeWeight text, Length text, TakeSection text, RunStart text, RunEnd text, OperateSection text, OperateStart text, OperateEnd text, AttendTime text, EndAttendTime text, TakeAims text, Problems text, Suggests text, UploadTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false, IsUploaded integer, RecirdTime integer, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists InstructorWifiRecord( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, InstructorId integer, RouterPositionId intege, ConnectFlag integer, ConnectTime text, IsDelete text not null default false, DeviceId integer, IsUploaded text not null default false)
create table if not exists LineAnnounceCommands( Id integer, TrainNoId integer, LineId integer, DriverId integer, CommandId integer, IsPassed integer not null default false, PassedTime text)
create table if not exists LineStations( Id INTEGER, LineId integer, StationName text, StationId integer, Sort integer, TableNamessss text)
create table if not exists MobileDevice( Id INTEGER, UniqueId text, DeviceType text, OsVersion text, AddTime text, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists PersonInfo( Id INTEGER, PersonId text, WorkNo text, DepartmentId text, Name text, Spell text, BirthDate text, Sex integer, PostId integer, PhotoPath text, IdentityNo text, UpdateTime text, Password text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false, LocaPhotoPath text, TableNamessss text)
create table if not exists Posts( Id INTEGER, PostName text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists StationFiles( Id INTEGER, StationId integer, FileType integer, FileSize text, FileName text, FilePath text, AddTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false, LocaPath text, IsLoaded text not null DEFAULT false, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists TraficFiles( Id INTEGER, TypeId integer, FileName text, FileExtension text, FileSize text, FilePath text, OriginFilePath text, CreatorId integer, DepartmentId integer, AddTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false, LocaPath text, IsLoaded text not null DEFAULT false, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists TraficFileType( Id INTEGER, TypeName text, ParentId integer, CreatorId integer, CreateTime text, DepartmentId integer, IsPublic text not null DEFAULT false, Hidden integer, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false, TableNamessss text)
create table if not exists TraficKeywords( Id INTEGER, Keywords text, SearchCount integer, AddTime integer, TableNamessss text)
create table if not exists TraficSearchRecord( Id INTEGER, PersonId integer, Keywords text, SearchCount integer, IsUploaded integer, TableNamessss text)
create table if not exists TraficSearchResult( Id INTEGER, KeywordsId integer, SearchResult text, TraficFileId text, Position text, TableNamessss text)
create table if not exists TraficSearchText( Id INTEGER, FileId integer, Chapter text, Item text, Content text, UpdateTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists TrainFormation( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, DriveRecordId integer, StationId integer, CarriageCount integer, CarryingCapacity text, Length text, Decompress text, RowTime text, FillingTime text, Missing text, NoteTime text, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists TrainMoment( Id INTEGER, TrainNoLineId integer, TrainStationId integer, ArriveTime text, DepartTime text, StopMinutes integer, IntervalKms text, SuggestSpeed text, Sort integer, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists TrainNo( Id integer, FullName text, Code text, Number text, Direction text, RunType integer, FirstStation text, LastStation text, UpdateTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false)
create table if not exists TrainNoLine( Id INTEGER, TrainNoId integer, LineId integer, Sort integer, UpdateTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false, TableNamessss text)
create table SeacherHistory( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, SearchCode text, TableNamessss text)

create table if not exists InstructorodJob( Id integer, InstructorId integer, WriteDate text, DriverId integer, odJobType text, GeneralSituation text, Suggests text, UploadTime text, IsDelete text not null DEFAULT false)

create view ViewPersonInfo as SELECT P.Id,P.PersonId,P.WorkNo,P.DepartmentId,D.DepartmentName,P.Name,P.Spell,P.BirthDate,P.Sex,P.PostId,T.PostName,P.PhotoPath,P.IdentityNo,P.Password,P.UpdateTime FROM PersonInfo P LEFT JOIN DepartInfo D ON P.DepartmentId=D.Id LEFT JOIN Posts T ON P.PostId=T.Id WHERE P.IsDelete=0;

CREATE VIEW ViewInstructorAccept AS SELECT A.Id,A.AcceptDate,A.InstructorId, A.DriverId, (SELECT Name FROM PersonInfo WHERE Id=A.DriverId) AS DriverName, A.ViceDriverId, (SELECT Name FROM PersonInfo WHERE Id=A.ViceDriverId) AS ViceDriverName, A.DriverScore,A.ViceDriverScore,A.Problems,A.Suggests,A.UploadTime, P.DepartmentId,P.DepartmentName,P.PostName,P.PostId,P.Name FROM InstructorAccept A LEFT JOIN ViewPersonInfo P ON A.InstructorId=P.Id WHERE A.IsDelete=0;

create view ViewInstructorAnalysis as SELECT A.Id,A.InstructorId,A.TrainCode,A.LocomotiveType,A.RunDate,A.RunSection,A.DriverId,(SELECT Name FROM PersonInfo WHERE Id=A.DriverId) AS DriverName,A.ViceDriverId,(SELECT Name FROM PersonInfo WHERE Id=A.ViceDriverId) AS ViceDriverName,A.AnalysisStart,A.AnalysisEnd,A.Problems,A.Suggests,A.UploadTime,P.DepartmentId,P.DepartmentName,P.PostName,P.PostId,P.Name FROM InstructorAnalysis A LEFT JOIN ViewPersonInfo P ON A.InstructorId=P.Id WHERE A.IsDelete=0;

create view ViewInstructorTempTake as SELECT A.Id,A.InstructorId,A.TakeDate,A.TrainCode,A.LocomotiveType,A.DriverId,(SELECT Name FROM PersonInfo WHERE Id=A.DriverId) AS DriverName,A.ViceDriverId,(SELECT Name FROM PersonInfo WHERE Id=A.ViceDriverId) AS ViceDriverName,A.StudentId,(SELECT Name FROM PersonInfo WHERE Id=A.StudentId) AS StudentName,A.CarCount,A.WholeWeight,A.Length,A.TakeSection,A.RunStart,A.RunEnd,A.OperateSection,A.OperateStart,A.OperateEnd,A.AttendTime,A.EndAttendTime,A.TakeAims,A.Problems,A.Suggests,A.UploadTime,P.DepartmentId,P.DepartmentName,P.PostName,P.PostId,P.Name FROM InstructorTempTake A LEFT JOIN ViewPersonInfo P ON A.InstructorId=P.Id WHERE A.IsDelete=0

create view ViewInstructorCheck as SELECT C.Id,C.InstructorId,C.StartTime,C.EndTime,C.Location,C.CheckType,C.ProblemCount,C.CheckContent,C.Problems,C.Suggests,C.UploadTime, P.DepartmentId,P.DepartmentName,P.PostName,P.PostId,P.Name FROM InstructorCheck C LEFT JOIN ViewPersonInfo P ON C.InstructorId=P.Id WHERE C.IsDelete=0

create view ViewInstructorodJob as SELECT A.Id,A.InstructorId,A.WriteDate, A.DriverId, (SELECT Name FROM PersonInfo WHERE Id=A.DriverId) AS DriverName, A.odJobType,A.GeneralSituation,A.Suggests,A.UploadTime, P.DepartmentId,P.DepartmentName,P.PostName,P.PostId,P.Name FROM InstructorodJob A LEFT JOIN ViewPersonInfo P ON A.InstructorId=P.Id WHERE A.IsDelete=0;

create view ViewInstructorKeyPerson as SELECT A.Id,A.InstructorId,A.ConfirmDate,A.KeyPersonId, (SELECT Name FROM PersonInfo WHERE Id=A.KeyPersonId) AS KeyPersonName, A.ExpectRemoveTime,A.ActualRemoveTime,A.KeyLocation,A.PersonConfirmReason,A.HelpMethod,A.Changes,A.PersonRemoveSuggests,A.LocationConfirmReason,A.ControlMethod,A.ActualControl,A.LocationRemoveSuggests,A.UploadTime, P.DepartmentId,P.DepartmentName,P.PostName,P.PostId,P.Name FROM InstructorKeyPerson A LEFT JOIN ViewPersonInfo P ON A.InstructorId=P.Id WHERE A.IsDelete=0;

create view ViewInstructorLocoQuality as SELECT A.Id,A.InstructorId,A.RegistDate,A.TrainCode,A.LocomotiveType, A.DriverId, (SELECT Name FROM PersonInfo WHERE Id=A.DriverId) AS DriverName, A.RepairClass,A.MaintenanceStatus,A.Score,A.FaultLocation,A.GeneralSituation,A.UploadTime, P.DepartmentId,P.DepartmentName,P.PostName,P.PostId,P.Name FROM InstructorLocoQuality A LEFT JOIN ViewPersonInfo P ON A.InstructorId=P.Id WHERE A.IsDelete=0;

create view ViewInstructorPeccancy as SELECT A.Id,A.InstructorId,A.WriteDate, A.DriverId, (SELECT Name FROM PersonInfo WHERE Id=A.DriverId) AS DriverName, A.PeccancyType,A.GeneralSituation,A.Analysis,A.Suggests,A.UploadTime, P.DepartmentId,P.DepartmentName,P.PostName,P.PostId,P.Name FROM InstructorPeccancy A LEFT JOIN ViewPersonInfo P ON A.InstructorId=P.Id WHERE A.IsDelete=0;

create view ViewInstructorPlan as SELECT A.Id,A.InstructorId,A.WriteDate,A.WorkSummary,A.Problems,A.WorkPlans,A.UploadTime, P.DepartmentId,P.DepartmentName,P.PostName,P.PostId,P.Name FROM InstructorPlan A LEFT JOIN ViewPersonInfo P ON A.InstructorId=P.Id WHERE A.IsDelete=0;

create view ViewInstructorRepair as SELECT A.Id,A.InstructorId,A.HappenTime,A.Location,A.TrainCode,A.LocomotiveType, A.DriverId, (SELECT Name FROM PersonInfo WHERE Id=A.DriverId) AS DriverName, A.ViceDriverId, (SELECT Name FROM PersonInfo WHERE Id=A.ViceDriverId) AS ViceDriverName, A.StudentId, (SELECT Name FROM PersonInfo WHERE Id=A.StudentId) AS StudentName, A.FaultLocation,A.FaultReason,A.Responsibility,A.UploadTime, P.DepartmentId,P.DepartmentName,P.PostName,P.PostId,P.Name FROM InstructorRepair A LEFT JOIN ViewPersonInfo P ON A.InstructorId=P.Id WHERE A.IsDelete=0;

create view ViewInstructorTeach as SELECT A.Id,A.InstructorId,A.TeachPlace,A.JoinCount,A.TeachStart,A.TeachEnd,A.TeachContent,A.UploadTime, P.DepartmentId,P.DepartmentName,P.PostName,P.PostId,P.Name FROM InstructorTeach A LEFT JOIN ViewPersonInfo P ON A.InstructorId=P.Id WHERE A.IsDelete=0;

create view ViewTrainNoLIne as SELECT TN.Id, TN.FullName, TL.Id AS TrainNoLineId, TL.Sort, BL.Id AS LineId, BL.LineName, BL.FirstStationId, BL.FirstStation, BL.LastStationId, BL.LastStation FROM TrainNo AS TN LEFT OUTER JOIN TrainNoLine AS TL ON TN.Id = TL.TrainNoId LEFT OUTER JOIN BaseLine AS BL ON TL.LineId = BL.Id WHERE (TN.IsDelete = 0);

create view View_Station as SELECT Id, SN, StationName, Spell, UpdateTime, FileCount, ZdCount, CzCount, ZcCount FROM (SELECT S.Id, S.SN, S.StationName, S.Spell, S.UpdateTime, (SELECT COUNT(1) AS Expr1 FROM StationFiles WHERE (StationId = S.Id) AND (IsDelete = 0)) AS FileCount, (SELECT COUNT(1) AS Expr1 FROM StationFiles WHERE (StationId = S.Id) AND (IsDelete = 0) AND (FileType = 1)) AS ZdCount, (SELECT COUNT(1) AS Expr1 FROM StationFiles WHERE (StationId = S.Id) AND (IsDelete = 0) AND (FileType = 2)) AS CzCount, (SELECT COUNT(1) AS Expr1 FROM StationFiles WHERE (StationId = S.Id) AND (IsDelete = 0) AND (FileType = 3)) AS ZcCount FROM BaseStation AS S LEFT OUTER JOIN StationFiles AS F ON S.Id = F.StationId WHERE (S.IsDelete = 0)) AS T GROUP BY Id, SN, StationName, Spell, UpdateTime, FileCount, ZdCount, ZcCount, CzCount;

create view ViewTrainMoment as SELECT M.Id,M.TrainNoLineId,M.TrainStationId,M.ArriveTime,M.DepartTime,M.StopMinutes,M.IntervalKms,M.SuggestSpeed,M.Sort, N.FullName,S.StationName,N.Id AS TrainNoId,L.LineId,B.LineName FROM TrainMoment M LEFT JOIN TrainNoLine L ON M.TrainNoLineId=L.Id LEFT JOIN TrainNo N ON L.TrainNoId=N.Id LEFT JOIN BaseLine B ON L.LineId=B.Id LEFT JOIN BaseStation S ON M.TrainStationId=S.Id

CREATE VIEW ViewAnnounceCommands AS SELECT AC.Id,AC.CommandNo,AC.CommandInterval,AC.SpeedLimitLocation,AC.StartEndTime,AC.LoseEffectTime,AC.LimitedSpeed,AC.AddTime,AC.IsActive, TN.FullName,TN.Code,TN.Number,TN.Direction,TN.RunType,TN.FirstStation,TN.LastStation,TN.UpdateTime, LAC.TrainNoId FROM TrainNo TN LEFT JOIN LineAnnounceCommands LAC ON TN.Id=LAC.TrainNoId LEFT JOIN AnnounceCommands AC ON LAC.CommandId=AC.Id WHERE AC.IsActive=1

create view ViewDriveRecord as SELECT DR.Id, DR.DriverId1, DR.DriverId2, DR.ViceDriverId, DR.StudentDriverId, DR.OtherDriverId, DR.LocomotiveType, DR.AttendTime, DR.GetTrainTime, DR.LeaveDepotTime1, DR.LeaveDepotTime2, DR.AttendForecast, DR.ArriveDepotTime1, DR.ArriveDepotTime2, DR.GiveTrainTime, DR.RecordEndTime, DR.OperateConsume, DR.StopConsume, DR.RecieveEnergy, DR.LeftEnergy, DR.EngineOil, DR.AirCompressorOil, DR.TurbineOil, DR.GearOil, DR.GovernorOil, DR.OtherOil, DR.Staple, DR.MultiLocoDepot, DR.MultiLocoType, DR.MultiLocoSection, DR.EndSummary, DR.AddTime, DR.IsDelete, VP1.WorkNo AS DriverWorkNo,VP1.Name AS DriverName, VP2.WorkNo AS ViceDriverWorkNo, VP2.Name AS ViceDriverName, VP3.WorkNo AS StuDriverWorkNo, VP3.Name AS StuDriverName, VP4.WorkNo AS OtherDriverWorkNo, VP4.Name AS OtherDriverName, DT.Id AS DriveTrainNoAndLineId, DT.TrainNoId, DT.LineId, TN.Code,TN.Direction,TN.FirstStation,TN.FullName,TN.LastStation,TN.Number,TN.RunType, DR.LineName FROM DriveRecords DR LEFT JOIN ViewPersonInfo VP1 ON DR.DriverId1=VP1.Id LEFT JOIN ViewPersonInfo VP2 ON DR.DriverId2=VP2.Id LEFT JOIN ViewPersonInfo VP3 ON DR.StudentDriverId=VP3.Id LEFT JOIN ViewPersonInfo VP4 ON DR.OtherDriverId=VP4.Id LEFT JOIN DriveTrainNoAndLine DT ON DR.Id=DT.DriveRecordId LEFT JOIN TrainNo TN ON DT.TrainNoId=TN.Id LEFT JOIN BaseLine BL ON DT.LineId=BL.Id
